document_data.name: Crow
document_data.mainbody: '''Crows''' were birds with slick black feathers and black glossy eyes similar to [[raven]]s. They were among the foremost scavengers in nature, and their omnivorous diet, potential as guard animals, and skill at hunting vermin made them useful as pets.
document_data.Behavior: These creatures were very literal minded and often distracted by shiny objects. They were intelligent enough to be taught how to speak.{{Cite dragon/200/Familiar Faces|32}}

Ecology.Habitats:
Beyond 
These birds were found throughout [[the North]]. In the [[Unapproachable East]], crows could be found around the [[Tannath Gap]] and [[Rashemen]].

Beyond [[Toril]], crows could be found on the planet [[Oerth]].
